      • addPlayer

        public void addPlayer(Player player)
        Adds a player to the game.
        Parameters:
        player - The player to add.

      • setupMap

        public void setupMap(int[][] map)
        Sets up the Risk map for use by connecting nodes until there are a specified number of nodes of each degree (specifying degrees 2 through 6).
        Parameters:
        map - Integer array of integer arrays specifying what to link each node to.

      • runGame

        public void runGame(boolean unloadPlayers,
           boolean unloadMap)
        Runs the game. The game map and the player list should already be set up!
        Parameters:
        unloadPlayers - Boolean specifying whether the list of players should be reset afterwards.
        unloadMap - Boolean specifying whether the graph of nodes should be reset afterwards.

      • runGame

        public void runGame()
        Overloaded runGame() that doesn't unload anything afterwards.
